org.openscience.cdk
Class AtomContainer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.openscience.cdk.ChemObject
        |
        +--org.openscience.cdk.AtomContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
CDKConstants, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Molecule, Ring
public class AtomContainer
extends ChemObject
implements java.lang.Cloneable

Base class for all chemical objects that maintain a list of Atoms and Bonds

Field Summary
protected  int atomCount
          Number of atoms contained by this object
protected  Atom[] atoms
          Internal array of atoms
protected  int bondCount
          Number of bonds contained by this object
protected  Bond[] bonds
          Internal array of bond
protected  int growArraySize
          Amount by which the bond and arom arrays grow when elements are added and the arrays are not large enough for that.

removeAtom

public void removeAtom(int position)
Removes the atom at the given position from the AtomContainer !!! Note that the bonds are unaffected, You also have to take care of removeing all bonds to this atom from the container.
Parameters:
position - The position of the atom to be removed.

removeAtom

public void removeAtom(Atom atom)
                throws NoSuchAtomException
Removes the given atom from the AtomContainer !!! Note that the bonds are unaffected, You also have to take care of removeing all bonds to this atom from the container.
Parameters:
atom - The atom to be removed
Throws:
NoSuchAtomException - throws if the atom is not in the container
